name: Startrek delta flyer - Time pilot remix
name_original: Startrek delta flyer - Time pilot remix
description:
Startrek delta flyer - Time pilot remix

Mod of retro remake competition time pilot in startrek voyager style - new graphics, enemies, sounds, music. I've included joy to key for the arrow keys and cntl button.

Original Game Coding by Jonathan Olds

Graphics by Konami modified by Jonathan Olds
Sound FX from internet sites

Original Game Copyright Konami 1982
PC Remake Copyright J.M.Olds 2003

Tribute remake by retroreloader 2017
